title: Launcher not downloading game properly?
body:
My friend wanted to get back into league of legends so I said i would give it a go. When I attempted to download the game, I ran the launcher but it did not automatically start an update like it used to. Instead it gives me the ability to click the launch button but after clicking it nothing happens. We have tried all other answers on the forums so I decided to seek help. Let me know what information you need and what solutions there might be.

Some possible issues we found when looking at patcher logs.

000001.090|  ERROR| ZoomScale -1.000000 not found, returning default index.
000001.090|   OKAY| Ignoring zoom value of 1.000000 since it's already been applied
000001.319|   OKAY| Resize window uxId 1 unnecessary, it's already 1280x800.
000001.319| ALWAYS| Window 1 is now visible.
000306.791| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000306.823| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000306.893| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000306.927| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)

000361.013| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000361.068| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000361.068| ALWAYS| Failed to retrieve server status (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/app/ChromeController.js:648)
000361.108| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)
000361.174| ALWAYS| Request failed, jqxhr= (http://riot:gNUkTNiYXQ5Y9G3_hyZJqQ@127.0.0.1:54111/static/bundle-chrome/src/js/main.js:34)

replies.body:
So when you click the launch button the client disappears and then nothing else happens? It sounds like your OS might be blocking the patcher from doing it's job correctly, which we should be able to patch up relatively easily (see what I did there?.....gods I need better jokes). 

If you go through all the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), you should be able to make sure your OS allows League to patch correctly.
Ok, I did everything in the permission guide, along with a new install. Seems like I'm stuck at the same spot.

There must be something entirely different happening that stops the patcher from running correctly. Let's go ahead and get you a little more one on one help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
I think I've done all of these (I've been working at this for awhile), but I will try them all again tonight when I get off work and let you know.
